descriptionHtml:
[img]http://www.brainpoof.com/personalimages/unpetite_undies.jpg[/img]

Requires UNPetite. Download it [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35748/?]Here[/url].

For the Socks download the original mod from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24444/?]Here[/url].

[img]http://www.brainpoof.com/personalimages/disclaimer.jpg[/img]
You are responsible for downloading and installing this mod. If you screw something up, it's on you.

[img]http://www.brainpoof.com/personalimages/description.jpg[/img]
This is a conversion of the Undies Mod by Petrovich.

It can be mixed and matched with other armors from various mods such as those from the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22168/?]03 - UNPetite Hmm What To Wear[/url].
All credit goes to Petrovich for the original work. All I did was move some vertices around.


[img]http://www.brainpoof.com/personalimages/installation.jpg[/img]
1. Download and Install via NMM or by dropping the files in the data folder.
2. Activate the esp file.
3. Go to the forge and craft it in the Miscellaneous section.

[img]http://www.brainpoof.com/personalimages/compatibilities.jpg[/img]
- Anything compatible with UNPetite.

[img]http://www.brainpoof.com/personalimages/credits.jpg[/img]
Bethesda, Nifskope, Autodesk, Niftools (Figment)
Dimonized for creating the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709/?]UNP model[/url].
Petrovich for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24444/?]Undies[/url].
Theru for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22267/?]Female Automorph Script[/url].
author: Nightasy
